title: Project Open Data Dataset
description: The metadata format for all federal open data. Validates a single JSON object entry (as opposed to entire Data.json catalog).

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be dcat:Dataset for each Dataset

title.title: Title
title.description: Human-readable name of the asset. Should be in plain English and include sufficient detail to facilitate search and discovery.

identifier.title: Unique Identifier
identifier.description: A unique identifier for the dataset or API as maintained within an Agency catalog or database.

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to quickly understand whether the asset is of interest.

accessLevel.description: The degree to which this dataset could be made publicly-available, regardless of whether it has been made available. Choices: public (Data asset is or could be made publicly available to all without restrictions), restricted public (Data asset is available under certain use restrictions), or non-public (Data asset is not available to members of the public)
accessLevel.title: Public Access Level

accrualPeriodicity.title: Frequency
accrualPeriodicity.description: Frequency with which dataset is published.

describedBy.title: Data Dictionary
describedBy.description: URL to the data dictionary for the dataset or API. Note that documentation other than a data dictionary can be referenced using Related Documents as shown in the expanded fields.

describedByType.title: Data Dictionary Type
describedByType.description: The machine-readable file format (IANA Media Type or MIME Type) of the distribution’s describedBy URL

modified.title: Last Update
modified.description: Most recent date on which the dataset was changed, updated or modified.

license.title: License
license.description: The license dataset or API is published with. See Open Licenses for more information.

spatial.title: Spatial
spatial.description: The range of spatial applicability of a dataset. Could include a spatial region like a bounding box or a named place.

temporal.title: Temporal
temporal.description: The range of temporal applicability of a dataset (i.e., a start and end date of applicability for the data).

isPartOf.title: Collection
isPartOf.description: The collection of which the dataset is a subset

theme.title: Category
theme.description: Main thematic category of the dataset.

keyword.title: Tags
keyword.description: Tags (or keywords) help users discover your dataset; please include terms that would be used by technical and non-technical users.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: A container for the array of Distribution objects

references.title: Related Documents
references.description: Related documents such as technical information about a dataset, developer documentation, etc.

vcard.title: Project Open Data ContactPoint vCard
vcard.description: A Dataset ContactPoint as a vCard object

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be vcard:Contact for contactPoint

fn.title: Contact Name
fn.description: A full formatted name, eg Firstname Lastname

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be dcat:Distribution for each Distribution

format.title: Format
format.description: A human-readable description of the file format of a distribution

mediaType.title: Media Type
mediaType.description: The machine-readable file format (IANA Media Type or MIME Type) of the distribution’s downloadURL

mediaSize.title: Media Size
mediaSize.description: The size of the meida file.

downloadURL.title: Download URL
downloadURL.description: URL providing direct access to a downloadable file of a dataset

accessURL.title: Access URL
accessURL.description: URL providing indirect access to a dataset

conformsTo.title: Data Standard
conformsTo.description: URL providing indirect access to a dataset

describedBy.title: Data Dictionary
describedBy.description: URL to the data dictionary for the distribution found at the downloadURL

describedByType.title: Data Dictionary Type
describedByType.description: The machine-readable file format (IANA Media Type or MIME Type) of the distribution’s describedBy URL

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be org:Organization for each publisher

name.title: Publisher Name
name.description: A full formatted name, eg Firstname Lastname

image.title: Image
image.description: Image or logo for the organization

table-schema.title: Table Schema
table-schema.description: A Table Schema for this resource, compliant with the [Table Schema](/tableschema/) specification.

description.title: Description
description.description: A text description. Markdown is encouraged.

format.description: The format keyword options for `string` are `default`, `email`, `uri`, `binary`, and `uuid`.
